prefix.description: This prefix will be included in the name of most resources.

region.description: The region where the resources are created.

address_space.description: The address space that is used by the virtual network. You can supply more than one address space. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

subnet_prefix.description: The address prefix to use for the subnet.

my_aws_key.description: AWS key to SSH into EC2 instances

my_tags.description: A map of tags to add to all resources.
